name: Faded Red Bandana
data: It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
Affects the user's ignore pain skill.
